definition: A form of feedback or evaluation that involves analyzing and assessing the merits, flaws, or quality of something, such as a work of art, performance, or idea. It is commonly used to express opinions, judgments, or observations about the strengths and weaknesses of a particular subject, often with the intention of providing constructive criticism or initiating a discussion.

examples.german: Ich habe eine Kritik an deinem Verhalten.
examples.english: I have a criticism of your behavior.

examples.german: Die Kritik an dem Film war sehr negativ.
examples.english: The criticism of the movie was very negative.

examples.german: Die Kritik an der Regierung wird immer lauter.
examples.english: The criticism of the government is getting louder.
